title: LF Supp and ADC for Clash/Flex 5s High Gold Solo Minimum
body:
We are currently looking for a Supp and ADC main who can dedicate themselves to our team. We will be looking to play together 4 nights a week including Clash. We desire players who are willing to learn and willing to expand their champion pool; but have a solid foundation of the macro aspects of LoL. 

_All applicants who wish to be considered must have a minimum of Gold 2 in solo queue but preferably Plat experience._

At the present all positions are filled. 

If you have any questions please feel free to ask and/or add me IG. IGN is **Myoakinurface**

Thanks
